Text: I've been using this ever since Windows 7 came out as an unmanaged client, but haven't been able to find a serial for the management console.  Is there one in this torrent?

I should clarify my previous comment.  This doesn't need a serial when used as an unmanaged client and it's a terrific upload, but if you want to install the management console which allows you to control the settings on other computers on your network it asks for a product serial number and I haven't been able to find one anywhere.
Use ep11 as the managed server and ep12 on the clients.
EP 11 isn't compatible with windows 7 just vista and XP.  I've tried.  Windows 7 requires EP 12.
in a server client environment with win 2003 servers you can use ep11 on the 2003 it will manage the ep12 clients.
I can`t update the virus and Spyware protection. :-(
Using Symantec Endpoint Protection v. 11.0.6005.562 with Command Server and pushed clients to Windows 7 Enterprise.  Currently running on over 50 machines.
